sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词都有"残忍的，野蛮的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: cruel, brutal, inhuman, savage, barbarous, fierce, ruthless
means: cruel ： 一般用词，指行动或态度的残忍。
brutal ： 指极端的残忍，强调无情或缺乏同情心，含不择手段的意味。
inhuman ： 着重缺乏同情心、仁爱等人类特有的良好的品质。
savage ： 指缺乏文明人应有的教养，尤指在动怒或冲动时表现出的粗野蛮横，含野蛮意味。
barbarous ： 专指只有原始或未开化的人才会有的残忍行为。
fierce ： 指天性凶恶，令人害怕。
ruthless与cruel同义。强调为达到目的，对别人的痛苦毫无怜悯之心。

sentence.Network_en: Successfully merging two banks requires a fast and ruthless attack on costs.
sentence.Network_cn: 成功合并两家银行需要坚决快速地着手解决费用问题。

sentence.Network_en: The late newspaper tycoon is condemned for his ruthless treatment of employees.
sentence.Network_cn: 已故的报业大亨因为残忍地对待员工而遭到谴责。

sentence.Network_en: Her lawyers have been ruthless in thrashing out a divorce settlement.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的律师在讨论离婚协议的过程中表现得非常坚决。

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...究需要大胆的想象力和眼光，需要一种对传统思维方式的冷酷无情（ruthless）；他非常喜好争辩（argumentative），同时也勇于挑 …
He was diplomatic , treacherous , ruthless ., 他好用手腕 , 奸诈 , 无情.
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... rusty 腐蚀的 ruthless 无情的 sable 黑貂.
有什么以less结尾的单词么..？_百度知道 ... rudderless 无舵的 ruthless 残忍的 S:sabbathless 无安息日的.

list.abs: I am the commander in chiefof a country that's responsible for ending a war and working inanother theater to confront a ruthless adversary that directlythreatens the American people and our allies .我是一国之最高统帅，而这个国家有责任结束一场战争并在另一战场抗击直接威胁美国人民和盟国的无情的敌人。

even when resolutions were reluctantly adopted , it was of no avail , for as soon as the time was ripe , they tore them up and started a ruthless war against the people .即使勉强地做了决议也是无益的，一待时机成熟他们就要撕毁切决议，并以残酷的战争反对人民。
人生悲剧：如何表达悲观情绪 ... 真让人失望！ What a disappointment! 真无情！ How ruthless! That's too bad.( 太遗憾了。).
Character  ... ... 感激不尽[ can't be thankful enough to] 赶尽杀绝[ none;be ruthless] 各尽所能[ everyone doing his best].

entry.def: If you say that someone is ruthless, you mean that you disapprove of them because they are very harsh or cruel, and will do anything that is necessary to achieve what they want.

example.ex: The President was ruthless in dealing with any hint of internal political dissent.
example.tran: 在处理任何内部政治分歧的苗头时，总统都毫不留情。

example.ex: ...an invasion by a ruthless totalitarian power...
example.tran: 残忍的极权主义国家的侵略

entry.tran: (行为等)坚决的，果断的，不留情面的
entry.def: A ruthless action or activity is done forcefully and thoroughly, without much concern for its effects on other people.

example.ex: Her lawyers have been ruthless in thrashing out a divorce settlement...
example.tran: 她的律师在讨论离婚协议的过程中表现得非常坚决。

example.ex: Successfully merging two banks requires a fast and ruthless attack on costs.
example.tran: 成功合并两家银行需要坚决快速地着手解决费用问题。

means.word_mean: 无情的; 冷酷的; 残忍的

sentences.en: The ruthless enemy killed the old lady.
sentences.cn: 残忍的敌人杀害了那位老太太。
